title: VTB Solutions
description: VTB Solutions is a consultancy firm specializing in low-code solutions, with a focus on developing and maintaining systems integrated with AI.
activities: Developing new services and maintaining features using AspNet Core API/MVC, and managing data with MongoDB via the MongoDB Driver ORM.
Creating front-end services with React JS, using React Router Dom, Tailwind CSS, and Hooks.
Maintaining systems with Blazor WebAssembly, incorporating jQuery, and SignalR for messaging services.
Integrating various services with Azure cloud services, and using Azure DevOps for deployment and management.
Integrating OpenAI services into customers' existing systems for data analysis and providing suggestions through the creation of specialized agents, utilizing both OpenAI and Azure OpenAI platforms.

title: Dokdex
description: Dokdex is a startup providing innovative solutions tailored to the cryptocurrency market, seeking to develop solutions in this emerging sector.
activities: Developing blockchain solutions using Solidity and Ethereum.
Creating secure and scalable APIs with Node.js and Express.
Implementing responsive front-end interfaces with React JS and Bootstrap.
Maintaining and updating cryptocurrency market analysis tools.
Collaborating with a team of developers to design and implement new features.

title: Jeep
description: Jeep is an iconic brand known for its rugged, versatile vehicles designed for off-road performance and adventure.
activities: Developing marketing websites and landing pages with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Implementing interactive features using React JS.
Ensuring cross-browser compatibility and optimizing web performance.
Collaborating with designers to create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces.
Maintaining and updating the company's main website and its subdomains.
